description:
What technology is currently employed for either continuous monitoring or amenable to remote transition for body temperature.  A disposable strip applied to the skin that includes both the ability to measure and transmit then information?  An app similar to that used to monitor heart rate on a smart phone?
Can be combined with GPS to have tracking included in the monitoring.
summary: Immense concern has surrounded exposed health care volunteers during their volunteer period and upon their return home and identifying if and when they become symptomatic (febrile) at the earliest possible moment to facilitate both early treatment and immediate quarantine.Is there a way to have an app on their phone or some other way to either continuously remotely monitor their body temperature or alert them to take, record and transmit their body temperature to a central monitoring process.  If a threshold body temperature or a threshold rate of rise occurs, both the patient and the monitoring body are alerted and mobilized.  ? reduce need for complete quarantine  especially if combined with educational reminders/alerts.
title: Remote body temperature monitoring and reporting in health care workers to detect early signs of infection
